config.d0: Hi! So what does your program need to do? Talk me through - step by step.
config.d1: And how does your code look like? Tell me what happens in each line.
config.d2: Which bit doesn't work? Tell me what it's supposed to do and why you think it SHOULD work?
config.d3: I hope that things have cleared up a bit now! If you still can't figure it out - try other help options! Good duck... I mean: luck! :)
